vidis.data
Class AUserLink

java.lang.Object
  vidis.data.mod.AUserComponent
      vidis.data.AUserLink
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserComponent, IUserLink
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultLink, DefaultLink, DefaultLink, DemoLink
public abstract class AUserLink
extends AUserComponent
implements IUserLink

abstract user link represents a link by a user; module writers should use this class to write their own link

Author:
dominik

getVariable

public final AVariable getVariable(String identifier)
Description copied from interface: IUserComponent
This function can be used to retrieve a user-scope set variable from the Simulator. If you specified a variable in the .msim configuration file you will retrieve it here as a String

getVariable in interface IUserComponent
